issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Add unit tests for inter queue preemption for dominant resource calculator

This message was automatically generated.

Sorry for the late review of this. This unit test is not actually testing the behavior of the {{DominantResourceCalculator}}. These unit tests use the {{DefaultResourceCalculator}} by default, and so this test is not actually using the DRF calculator.

Oh my bad. I didnt check the class in detail.
Let me check and i ll get back.
Hi [~eepayne], thank you for your comments. Could you please share some suggestion on what's the ideal scenario we should modify the test to cover?

Hi [~sunilg] , thanks for your comments, I think here is one thing I need to do to improve the patch, This UT is not siutable inside  TestProportionalCapacityPreemptionPolicyForNodePartitions since it's not testing preemption with Node partitions. I'll create a new test class and put the test in.

bq. So when we set the last parameter to true, we will use DRF calculator.
[~Zian Chen], yes, I see that now. Thanks for pointing it out. I was strictly looking at the value of {{yarn.scheduler.capacity.resource-calculator}} at the point when {{editSchedule()}} is called.
[~eepayne] , sure, no problem! Really appreciate your comments.
[~sunilg] , updated the patch with newly created test classes. Could you help review it? Thanks!

Thanks [~Zian Chen] for the contribution, thanks [~eepayne] for additional reviews. I have backported to branch-3.1 / 3.0. [~eepayne], could i backport this to branch-2.9/2.8 as well?

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #14076 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/14076/])
YARN-8004. Add unit tests for inter queue preemption for dominant (sunilg: rev 71220d218db59cab0b03bbba427e5e9ef5b3003c)
* (add) hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-server/hadoop-yarn-server-resourcemanager/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/resourcemanager/monitor/capacity/TestProportionalCapacityPreemptionPolicyInterQueueWithDRF.java

bq. could i backport this to branch-2.9/2.8 as well?
[~sunilg], sure that would be fine. Thanks for the reviews and commits.
